title: So my take on Bronze so far.....
body:
I've just started doing ranked. I'm in Bronze 3, you got to start somewhere right.

Almost every single game goes like this:

Game starts. One person starts feeding, that person starts blaming\scapegoating someone else on the team, game degenerates into a clusterfuck of people calling each other Bronze scrubs, which is ridiculous because obviously everyone is around the same mmr so EVERYONE is bronze.

Oh and all you guys claiming to be plat smurfs..... if you were really at plat level you would carry. But you don't because your not a plat smurf, you are full of shit and you are absolutely ridiculous if you think that everyone is stupid enough to buy that absolute bs. Just saying.

I would just like a few games where people actually treat each other like human beings and try and stay positive when things go tits up.

But I feel like I'm the only person who feels that way. 

Anyone else out there who is having the same issues as me?

replies.body:
Im not having the same issues bcz i stopped playing ranked until i can get 5 wins with 5 kills more then deaths in a row without losing (on 1 champ) but im in s5 and its the same.
will be like that till gold prolly >_<
 Just mute or be super nice.
I hate that my only counter to this kind of behavior is mute the whole team and hope for the best. Like.... how fucking sad is that.
Well. there is a reason your in there, its bcz you didnt do too great in promos no matter what your team does. this is justice, might be cruel but yelo
Yes, because I did bad in my promos I deserve to be treated like crap in bronze forever. Justice. Right.
LOL That attitude, no. you dont deserve to be treated like that.. but they are as good or better then you. but they have bad attitudes. you wont be in bronze *forever* if you get better

First of all I'm only gold 3 now, but climbing. 

I played a few rank for my friend who is in bronze. People don't believe you are smurf normally, even my alkali average kda around 12/5/11 with his account. Smurf doesn't mean he can 1 V 5 all the time, he still need his team. There are many problems in bonze, front lanes don't know hot to engage, support does't know how to peel or crest vision, adc tried to be front lane and chase dying enemy miles deep when there is no vision, losing lanes can keep feeding with 10+ death each game, and the whole team except support doesn't want to buy wards or upgrade twinkles. 

I lost 2 or 3 games with his account as Akali, even I had full build 20+ kills. And ppl still blame me " u said u are smurf, but you didn't carry". Well, what else I could do? Pinging map means nothing, ppl don't wanna listen.

I think if you believe you are better than bronze, get a sliver duo with you. AND DO NOT PLAY RANKED WHEN SCHOOL HOLIDAYS OR DAY TIME DURNING WEEKENDS.

> [{quoted}](name=FromLanXiang,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kfEiKm15,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-11T05:03:46.804+0000)

> I think if you believe you are better than bronze, get a sliver duo with you. AND DO NOT PLAY RANKED WHEN SCHOOL HOLIDAYS OR DAY TIME DURNING WEEKENDS.

Very good advice. I'd even narrow it to: play ranked in the mornings only, NOT AFTER 3PM.
Get more than 3cs per minute and don't feed and you will escape bronze pretty fast.

I never feed.  But sometimes I feel like I don't have a big enough impact on the game.

TBH it's really hard to climb when every single game the same thing happens , which is what I wrote about ^^^^

> [{quoted}](name=Seasons of Love,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kfEiKm15,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-10T07:17:14.418+0000)
>
> I never feed.  But sometimes I feel like I don't have a big enough impact on the game.
> 
> TBH it's really hard to climb when every single game the same thing happens , which is what I wrote about ^^^^

TBH dying 1 time is bad, dying any more is even worse, so feeding doesnt mean your deaths are higher then your kills it means you die and thus give them leads

I thought that feeding meant that you have a negative KD with more than two or more deaths at any point of the game.
You can also be throwing/feeding by continuously feeding for a period of time even if you still have a positive KD. Like if your ADC is pretty good but gets pissed off by how bad their team is going and decides to feed/troll; for example 10/2/2 to 10/9/2 in a space of a dozen minutes.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kfEiKm15,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T04:57:49.550+0000)
>
> I thought that feeding meant that you have a negative KD with more than two or more deaths at any point of the game.
> You can also be throwing/feeding by continuously feeding for a period of time even if you still have a positive KD. Like if your ADC is pretty good but gets pissed off by how bad their team is going and decides to feed/troll; for example 10/2/2 to 10/9/2 in a space of a dozen minutes.


Dying 1 time is feeding, but alot of people assume that if there 75/60/15 its not feeding xD

They aren't feeding (if they full heartedly aren't meaning to) when they get two kills per death when their death count is over 10. You can have an ADC or Mid-carry that has died 10 times but has over 20 kills. 
If you died once, you fed one kill, but you aren't considered feeding in a continuous sense.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kfEiKm15,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-13T05:00:31.678+0000)
>
> Dying 1 time is feeding, but alot of people assume that if there 75/60/15 its not feeding xD
But: people continue to feed, get me ? lel

There's people like this at every rank (maybe a little more at bronze), just gotta mute them staight away. Theres nothing to be gained from trying to argue or reason with those kinda players. Tell your teammates to mute them too if you notice people are arguing with them. Once people start spending more time typing to each other than actually playing, your chances get alot worse.

Also remember theres gunna be plenty of people like this on the enemy team so stomping your lane or picking one lane to camp the hell out of (whether you're jungling or just roaming a lot) will likely make someone on the other team start raging and increase your chances of winning. This is particularly effective vs opponents who are all-chating about getting camped/not getting help/having bad teammates.

If you want chill games just get a party of 5 for normals, either with friends or just by adding random teammates who were friendly/nice to play with.
That's a ruthless way to piss people off and win match, daym.
That is actually good advice. Thanks.

You're mentally handicapped if you call people mentally handicapped.

So I'm mentally handicapped for saying they're mentally handicapped for calling people mentally handicapped.

I got bronze 2 on Saturday, and I am having the same issues. I might need to start blocking. I main support, and admittedly I am not the best, but I am learning. I ward, I upgrade trinkets, I try and play to my carry, but its always the bad attitudes. 

I might have to start ignoring people.

Happens in every ELO, not just Bronze.

Welcome to League of Legends, where everyone is shit and its all your fault
Welcome To Hell Buddy
